en.link-desc: Link or Unlink user account with steam
en.setup-desc: Link the server to BOT's API and setup the bot
en.link-command-brief: Link Discord user with their Steam account
en.bot-not-setup: The bot didn't setup in this server, please use command `{}setup`
en.account-already-linked: Your account is already linked to [steam account](https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/{})
en.steam-linked-to-another-user: Sorry, This steam is already linked to another user
en.command-unlink-brief: Unlink steam account for mentioned user
en.unable-to-unlink: Unable to unlink {}; Their account is already not linked
en.no-lobbies: No lobbies found in the server, Use command `{}create-lobby` to create a lobby
en.lobby-map-pool-updated: Map pool saved successfully for lobby {}
en.lobbies-chanel-not-existed:
Unable to create a new lobby because the lobbies channel doesn't exist
Use command `{}setup` to create lobbies channel
en.failed-create-lobby: Unable to create a new lobby: Database Error
en.match-setup-cancelled: Match setup has been canceled because to the match setup message has been deleted
en.command-setup-brief: Setup the bot and connect to the API
en.command-stats-brief: Display your stats in the server
en.stats-not-linked: Unable to get {}'s stats: Their account is not linked
en.stats-no-matches: Unable to get {}'s stats: No matches played
en.command-required-perm: Sorry! You are missing **{}** permission to use this command!
en.command-end-brief: Cancel a live match (must have kick members perms)
en.command-add-brief: Add a player to a live match (Must have kick members perms)
en.command-add-not-linked: Unable to add player: {} is not linked!
en.command-add-success: Player {} added successfully to the match #{}
en.command-remove-brief: Remove a player from a live match (Must have kick members perms)
en.command-remove-success: Player {} removed successfully from the match #{}
en.command-pause-brief: Pause a live match (Must have kick members perms)
en.command-unpause-brief: Unpause a live match (Must have kick members perms)
en.help-use-help: Use `{}help` for a list of commands
en.help-info-brief: Display basic info about this bot
en.help-bot-description:
_**G5** is a Discord bot to manage CS:GO PUGs_

__**How To Start?**__
*First you should sign in your steam in our website to generate your unique api key*
    1️⃣ Visit [our website]({})
    2️⃣ Click on `Sign in through STEAM` on the top right of the page.
    3️⃣ Sign in your steam.
    4️⃣ Visit your profile page and copy your api key.
    5️⃣ Use command `{}setup` to connect your server to our API
6️⃣ Finally, Use command `{}create-lobby` to create your first lobby

[More Info](https://top.gg/bot/816798869421031435)
en.lobby-footer: Players will receive a notification when the lobby fills up
en.lobby-user-not-linked: Unable to add **{}**: Account is not linked
en.lobby-user-in-lobby: Unable to add **{}**: User is already in the lobby
en.lobby-user-in-match: Unable to add **{}**: User is already in a match
en.lobby-is-full: Unable to add **{}**: The lobby is full
en.lobby-user-not-in-lobby: Unable to remove **{}**: User isn't in the lobby
en.lobby-unready-footer: The missing players have been removed from the lobby
en.match-took-too-long: The match setup took too long!
en.message-team-pick-footer: React to any of the numbers below to pick the corresponding member
en.message-map-veto-footer: React to any of the map icons below to ban or pick the corresponding map
en.message-map-pool-footer:
React with the maps reactions bellow to toggle on/off the
corresponding map in the map pool Then react with ✅ to save changes
en.message-react-ready: React with the {} below to ready up (1 minute)
en.command-cap-brief: Set the capacity of the lobby (Must have admin perms)
en.capacity-out-range: Capacity must be an even number in range (2-100)
en.queue-emptied-footer: The lobby has been emptied because of the capacity change
en.command-teams-brief: Set the team creation method of the lobby (Must have admin perms)
en.team-method-already: The current team creation method of this lobby is already set to **{}**
en.team-valid-methods: Team creation method must be {}, {} or {}
en.command-captains-brief: Set the captains selection method of the lobby (Must have admin perms)
en.captains-method-already: The current captain selection method is already set to **{}**
en.captains-valid-method: Captain selection method must be {}, {} or {}
en.command-mpool-brief: Edit the map pool of the lobby (must have admin perms)
en.command-series-brief: Set the series type of the lobby (must have admin perms)
en.series-value-already: The current series value is already set to **{}**
en.match-info-footer: Server will close after 10 minutes if anyone doesn't join
en.command-region-brief: Set or remove the region of the lobby
en.connect-api-error: Unable to connect to the API, Please try again later.
